text: James Reid (November 14, 1839 - November 15, 1915) was a Canadian politician. Born in Charlo Station, New Brunswick, he was elected to the House of Commons of Canada for Restigouche in the 1900 federal election. A Liberal, he was re- elected in 1904, 1908, and 1911. He died while in office in 1915. ==References== * Category:1839 births Category:1915 deaths Category:Liberal Party of Canada MPs Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada from New Brunswick
title: James Reid (New Brunswick politician)
